name: Defined - Faldo:ExactPosition
description: Event happens on position specified by position_one

name: Range - Faldo:InRangePosition
description: Event happens on the peptide between position_one (start) and position_two (end)

name: Alternative - Faldo:OneOfPosition
description: Event happens on position_one OR position_two

name: Connected
description: Event happens on position_one AND position_two

name: Unknown - Faldo:FuzzyPosition
description: No position information available for the event
